basic.description:
Combinational circuits; sequential circuits; digital systems design; micro-programming; bus structures; data communications; interface design; microprocessor systems.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (12L;24Lb;60P)
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Digital Systems

extra.enrollment_requirement:
ENG Requisites: Exclusions:  Elec272 and ELEC373.  
Arts & Sci Requisites:  prereq of CISC221
